author: maximiliam
title: aged... but still amazing!
review:
Okay, so you may think that this is just some old set... well you're wrong!

This is a great set and here's what I think of it!



(: things:

1. It has a wide color range.
2. It is a very movable set.
3. Wagon can connect to a lego train.
4. Racer is # 1! ( literally! )




): things:

1. The racer can't hold his trophy!
2. Car is one piece.
